events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund because this product does not meet my expectations at all.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product in the shipment.
Assigning the case to a customer service agent specialized in refund requests and returns.
Hello, I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the product you received?
To process your refund quickly, I need the order number and photographic proof of the wrong item you received.
My order number is 987654321 and I've attached photos showing the product is not what I ordered and is completely different.
Thanks for the details. We can offer you a full refund or send the correct item immediately. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to receive the correct item instead of a refund, as I really want the product I've initially ordered.
The correct item has been dispatched to your address and you will receive a confirmation email with tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the correct item and that everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, I received the right product today and it looks great. Thank you for resolving this so quickly.
We’re closing this case as resolved. Please reach out if you need any further assistance, and thank you for your patience.
